org.webcurator.ui.util
Class TabStatus

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.ui.util.TabStatus

public class TabStatus
extends java.lang.Object

The TabStatus object represents the current status of the tabs which, in turn, affects how they are displayed. This object tracks whether the tabs are enabled and which of the tabs is currently selected.

Author:
bbeaumont
